General.Name: DocCheck AG
General.Description: DocCheck AG offers marketing, customer relationship management, and e-commerce services for the healthcare sector in Europe. The company operates DocCheck portal for exchanging information on the Internet, and online and e-commerce services for healthcare market players. It also develops and implements communication strategies for media on healthcare and business-to-business sectors; and promotes healthcare startups through seed funding. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Cologne, Germany.
